changeSet.author: litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: create table address ( id serial primary key, country varchar(20) not null, city varchar(20) not null, street varchar(20) not null, house_number integer not null, constraint UC_country_city_street_house_number unique (country, city, street, house_number) );

changeSet.author: litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: create table cinema ( id serial primary key, name varchar(20) not null, address_id integer not null, number_of_hall integer not null, parking boolean not null, cafe boolean not null, constraint UC_name unique (name), constraint fk_address foreign key (address_id) references address (id) );

changeSet.author: litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: create table hall ( id serial primary key, cinema_id integer not null, three_D boolean not null, dolby_atmos_sound boolean not null, number_of_seats integer not null, number_of_person integer not null, deluxe boolean not null, constraint fk_cinema foreign key (cinema_id) references cinema (id) );

changeSet.author: litvinov.d
litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: create table place ( id serial primary key, hall_id integer not null, armchair_type_id integer not null, row integer not null, place integer not null, constraint UC_row_place unique (row, place), constraint fk_hall foreign key (hall_id) references hall (id), constraint fk_armchair_type foreign key (armchair_type_id) references armchair_type (id) );

changeSet.author: litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: create table schedule ( id serial primary key, hall_id integer not null, movie_id integer not null, show_date timestamp with time zone default current_date, start_time time with time zone not null, end_time time with time zone not null, constraint fk_hall foreign key (hall_id) references hall (id) );

changeSet.author: litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: alter table schedule drop constraint fk_hall, drop column hall_id;

changeSet.author: litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: alter table schedule drop column show_date, drop column start_time, drop column end_time, add column start_date_time timestamp with time zone default current_date, add column end_date_time timestamp with time zone default current_date;

changeSet.author: litvinov.d
changeSet.sql: create table halls_schedules ( hall_id integer not null, schedule_id integer not null, constraint fk_hall foreign key (hall_id) references hall (id), constraint fk_schedule foreign key (schedule_id) references schedule (id) );
